nodes.text: The arool was a species of cactus that was native to Ithor, a planet in the Ottega sector. The arool was one of several semi-sentient plant species on the planet; others included the bafforr and the vesuvague trees. The arool was poisonous to Humans.

The arool was created by Dave Wolverton for the short story The Sand Tender: The Hammerhead's Tale. It later received entries in the Star Wars Encyclopedia (1998) and The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia (2008), both mistakenly spelled "arrol."
